member.name: M:Overn_Delights_POS.BarcodeConverter.ToBarcode(System.String)
member.summary: Convert invoice/order number to 13-digit barcode Format: [DocType:1][Branch:2][Sequence:10] Example: "O-OD200-000033" -> "2200000000033"

member.name: M:Overn_Delights_POS.BarcodeConverter.FromBarcode(System.String)
member.summary: Convert 13-digit barcode back to invoice/order number Example: "2200000000033" -> "O-OD200-000033"

member.summary: Add a new branch code mapping
